messages.subject: rod
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/16/2003 9:56:42 PM Central Standard Time, ... Ok, I don t believe in beating kids.  The reference you are talking about is Proverbs 22:6.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/16/2003 9:56:42 PM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> THE ROD???? What the heck is that? Well, I am one of those Christian
> freaks that DOESN'T believe "the rod" means beat your kids. I had one
> friend
> tell me it was her God-given right to spank her children. If anyone can
> please
> show me that in the Bible???

Ok, I don't believe in beating kids. The reference you are talking about is
Proverbs 22:6.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
